name: Albert Levi
content: Homepage of Albert Levi Prof. Albert Levi Dr. Albert Levi is a professor of computer science and engineering at Sabanci University, Istanbul, Turkey More up-to-date info about him can be found in his CV (updated MarchÂ  2023). This page is not maintained anymore. You may refer to his page maintained by SU at https://fens.sabanciuniv.edu/en/faculty-members/detail/478 His Google Scholar profile: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=ls6NkwEAAAAJ&hl=en
